hopobject.name: botspeak
hopobject.body: BotSpeak is a simple language for microprocessors. Our goal is to develop small virtual machines for a large number of microprocessors in this way. It will not work exceptionally for any one processor but it will be a starting point for all processors. We welcome all the help we can get.
hopobject.shortdesc: BotSpeak is a simple language for microprocessors using a small virtual machine and talking to National Instruments LabVIEW as a host language
